author: Simon Difford
description: Apple and Zubr√≥wka is a magic combination, as is apple and elderflower. Here these flavoursome combinations are enhanced and freshened by cucumber.
name: Apple, Cucumber & Elderflower cup
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
